General.Name: Spectre Capital Corp
General.Description: Spectre Capital Corp. does not have significant operations. It intends to identify, evaluate, and negotiate an agreement to acquire an interest in a material asset or business. The company was formerly known as Altus Acquisition Corp. and changed its name to Spectre Capital Corp. in October 2018. Spectre Capital Corp. was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 409 Granville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1T2
